task.shortdesc: This section contains the details of JIRA project creation.

context.p: Do the following steps to create the projects in JIRA:

step.cmd: Use the Create Project option to create the project
After clicking the create project option a new window prompts you to provide basic information about the project, then click submit.
Store the ICD tickets in the project that you have created.
ICD tickets are stored as a links, Click on the links to direct the Incidents applications in ICD to JIRA defects.
